IN.IC: je oblika za sedanjik, preteklik in pretekli deležnik.

sense.def:
To spread something
pomeni nekaj urediti na določeni površini, da je mogoče vse zlahka videti ali uporabiti.

seg.quote: He took the envelope, tipped it open and spread the contents on the table.

sense.def:
To spread one's hands, arms, or legs
pomeni razmakniti dlani, roke ali noge daleč narazen.

seg.quote: He just shrugged and spread his hands.

sense.def:
To spread a substance on a surface
pomeni dati tanko plast neke snovi na določeno površino.

seg.quote: Liz was spreading marmalade on a piece of toast.
I love biscuits spread with butter.

sense.def:
A spread
je mehko živilo, ki ga namažemo na kruh.

Kadar nekaj
spreads
, postopoma doseže ali vpliva na večje območje ali število oseb.

seg.quote: A stain was spreading on the bathroom ceiling.
News of the wreck spread quickly.
Disease might be spread very easily.

sense.def:
The spread of something
je vse večja navzočnost ali pojavljanje nečesa.

seg.quote: Girls have benefited more than boys from the spread of higher education.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
spreads over a period of time
, se dogaja v določenem obdobju.

seg.quote: The breeding season is spread over five months.

sense.def:
A spread of ideas, interests, or other things
je širok izbor idej, zanimanj ali drugih stvari.

seg.quote: The IBA wants to have a broad spread of opinion represented on its board.

sense.def:
Kadar osebe, živali ali vozila
spread out
ali
are spread out
, so daleč narazen.

seg.quote: They followed him and spread out, nervously, in the forest.
My family were spread out all over the countryside.

sense.def:
To spread something out
pomeni nekaj razporediti po določeni površini, tako da je vse mogoče zlahka videti ali uporabiti.

seg.quote: I removed the tool kit and spread it out on the seat.
